snippet.title: Get Trapped in an Elevator with Strangers and... a Ghost?! - Sempre Trailer #SpooktoberVNJam
snippet.description:
Download the game here!!
https://no-xiruo.itch.io/sempre

Sempre was made for the Spooktober VN Jam 2023!! 
If you play our game during this month of October, please also drop a rating!!
https://itch.io/jam/spooktober-2023/rate/2285535

---

JJJreact section:
Hello! Dunno if you'll read this, but I'd love feedback on my trailers.
I want to make cool Visual Novel games and advertise that through trailers, but the gameplay isn't always the most interesting thing. (Lots of reading in a visual NOVEL game.)
Any advice on how to make the trailers more ... COOL?? EXCITING?? Instead of something.. kinda cringey, would be very helpful. Without falsely advertising what the game is/looks like.
Thank you!!!

BTW
This was made for a game jam, which means I had a month to make the game and also advertise it :)))))
Which of course, would have been easier if I had a larger team working on it haha, but I can't manage that many people.
So, if you also have any advice on how to uh.. OPTIMIZE video editing, let me know.
(I use a free open source software called kdenlive because I don't edit enough to warrant paid software, but if I go down the path of editing more, I'll probably buy a license.)

---

Game and Trailer Music:
FelidaeMelody
https://www.felidaemelodyscampfire.com/

---

Voices:
Anon ............................... MJ Chestang
https://twitter.com/mjmagicish
Alroy ............................... Zach Clemens
https://www.youtube.com/@MaybeMidnight
Calypso .......................... Phebe Fabacher
https://www.phebevoices.com/
Callum ............................ Ren Alberg
https://twitter.com/renjamin_speaks
Erica ............................... Elissa Park
https://twitter.com/AdoxTalks

---

Art, Writing, Coding:
https://twitter.com/no_xiruo

Writing, The Kid With Adobe Audition:
https://twitter.com/mikoori_

Additional Audio Aid:
https://twitter.com/zaerin_7

---

If you scrolled this far, good job!!
Here's a treat:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UxxAKTLfc54
